attributes.action: Grand National fences Lower the height!
attributes.additional_details:
Horses die yet again on Grand National Day.

Sport is meant to be a enjoyable event and seeing horses break their legs or collapse from exhaustion is not enjoyable!

These poor animals already have to cope with running over 4 miles so have some mercy and reduce the fence heights. It won't spoil the race for anyone and at least it will help to minimise senseless animal deaths.
